description: This file defines a React Native functional component for the 'Discover' screen of a recipe app. It handles displaying a search bar, filtering recipes by query and tags, and rendering recipe cards. It imports local and external modules such as React, React Native components, theme styles, dataset in JSON format, custom components, and navigation types.

methods.name: DiscoverScreen
methods.description: React functional component that renders the Discover screen, managing state for search query and active tag, filtering data accordingly, and rendering UI elements such as search input, tag filters, and recipe list.
